error.message: Parameter $event of method Drupal\simple_block_layout_builder\Event\Subscriber\SimpleBlockAddControllerSubscriber::alterBuild() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseForControllerResultEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ViewEvent instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
